Sosatie (pl sosaties) bụ nri ọdịnala South Afrika nke anụ (na-abụkarị nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ atụrụ) nke a na-esi na skewers. Okwu a sitere na sate ("anụ a na-etinye n'ime anụ") na saus (sauce na-esi ísì ụtọ)
Ọ sitere na Cape Malay, nke a na-eji na Afrikaans, asụsụ bụ isi nke Cape Malays, okwu ahụ enwetala mgbasa onye ka ukwuu na mba South Afrika
A na-eme anụ a na-eme ka ọ dị nro, anụ a na'ime ya (nke na-abụkarị nwa atụrụ) ma sie ya site na ụdị braaing (barbecued) shish-kebab
Ntụziaka Sosatie dịgasị iche, mana ihe ndị a na-ejikarị eme ya nwere ike ịgụnye cubes nke nwa atụrụ, anụ ehi, ọkụkọ, apricots a mịrị amị, yabasị na-acha ọbara ọbara na ose agwakọta.

Iji kwadebe, a na-etinye iberibe atụrụ n'otu abalị n'ime yabasị e siri esi, chillies, galik, akwụkwọ curry na mmiri tamarind, mgbe ahụ a na-agbanye ya na skewers ma ọ bụ pan-esiri ya ma ọ bụ sie ya. Otú ọ dị, ụzọ kachasị ewu ewu isi sie sosaties bụ n'èzí, na braai (ma ọ bụ barbecue)
A na-ejikarị obere yabasị, ose a pịrị apị, apricots a mịrị amị ma ọ bụ prunes na-agwakọta anụ ahụ.
